Quote.Author: Vincent Bugliosi
Quote.QuoteValue: I, for one, can't be sure at all there is a God

Quote.Author: Vincent Cassel
Quote.QuoteValue: The minute I started being recognised, I became much more discreet

Quote.Author: Vincent Cassel
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't escape from what you are

Quote.Author: Vincent Cassel
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up watching 'Raging Bull.'

Quote.Author: Vincent Cassel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a little angry in life

Quote.Author: Vincent Cassel
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm actually more vulnerable than people imagine

Quote.Author: Vincent Cassel
Quote.QuoteValue: I always had the sense of being in the spotlight, being on stage, being looked at

Quote.Author: Vincent Cassel
Quote.QuoteValue: To work with somebody you love makes filming faster, more fun

Quote.Author: Vincent Cassel
Quote.QuoteValue: There's only so much you can control in life

Quote.Author: Vincent Cassel
Quote.QuoteValue: I have learned that acting is not about beauty

Quote.Author: Vincent Cassel
Quote.QuoteValue: They say the day you lose your parents, you start to look like them

Quote.Author: Vincent D'Onofrio
Quote.QuoteValue: And I have been able to establish this sort of decent reputation as being a decent character actor

Quote.Author: Vincent D'Onofrio
Quote.QuoteValue: Then I did Mystic Pizza, just to do something I wasn't fat in

Quote.Author: Vincent D'Onofrio
Quote.QuoteValue: I took a route of acting, rather than starmaking, so it cost me a lot financially

Quote.Author: Vincent D'Onofrio
Quote.QuoteValue: The search for the truth is not for the faint hearted

Quote.Author: Vincent D'Onofrio
Quote.QuoteValue: What kind of recognition do I deserve? I don't deserve any recognition

Quote.Author: Vincent D'Onofrio
Quote.QuoteValue: Like De Niro. He's one of the best character actors we have ever had

Quote.Author: Vincent D'Onofrio
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you are known, the more difficult it is to hide behind characters

Quote.Author: Vincent D'Onofrio
Quote.QuoteValue: This haunting idea of becoming a celebrity doesn't settle well with me at all

Quote.Author: Vincent D'Onofrio
Quote.QuoteValue: Look, all you can do when you find your niche is go with it

Quote.Author: Vincent D'Onofrio
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never tried to be something I'm not

Quote.Author: Vincente Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Color can do anything that black-and-white can

Quote.Author: Vincente Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: But I went down to Venezuela and spend a few weeks going through jungles. It's fantastic looking

Quote.Author: Vincente Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: It's the story that counts

Quote.Author: Vincente Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I always have coffee without sugar, you know. Just cream

Quote.Author: Vincente Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: But surrealism is present in most of my pictures

Quote.Author: Vincente Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: The Pirate is surrealism and so, in a curious way, is Father of the Bride

Quote.Author: Vincente Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I use colors to bring fine points of story and character

Quote.Author: Vincente Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Designing Woman was written for the screen

Quote.Author: Vincente Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Dali was the great painter then and surrealism was a way of life

Quote.Author: Vincente Minnelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I learn new things all the time

Quote.Author: Ving Rhames
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you do a stunt, the more you increase the risk of something happening

Quote.Author: Ving Rhames
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't give Hollywood the power to limit me. Only God can limit me

Quote.Author: Ving Rhames
Quote.QuoteValue: Since God is the foundation of my life, anything that streams from that can only be positive

Quote.Author: Ving Rhames
Quote.QuoteValue: You can feel I am whatever you want to feel I am. God knows who I am, and I know who I am

Quote.Author: Ving Rhames
Quote.QuoteValue: I graduated on a Friday. By Monday, I was doing Shakespeare in the Park

Quote.Author: Ving Rhames
Quote.QuoteValue: Rottweilers are victims of a stereotype. They're not that bad

Quote.Author: Ving Rhames
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been interested in cross-cultural exchange with the youth

Quote.Author: Ving Rhames
Quote.QuoteValue: I live a very simple life

Quote.Author: Ving Rhames
Quote.QuoteValue: God has blessed me with a certain amount of presence and a certain amount of charisma

Quote.Author: Ving Rhames
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the spokesman for ADT, and ADT, brother, pays better than most actors make on film

Quote.Author: Vinnie Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always had my ear pierced with a diamond stud. I did it myself when I was 16

Quote.Author: Vinnie Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I buy hats like women buy shoes. I have well over 150

Quote.Author: Vinnie Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: For some people, becoming a parent does change them, but it never changed me

Quote.Author: Vinnie Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: People say you can get bored of the sunshine in L.A. No, you can't

Quote.Author: Vinnie Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: After 'Big Brother,' people came up to me in the street shouting, 'You woz robbed!'

Quote.Author: Vinnie Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: John Wayne never ever disappointed his fans, because he was a cowboy

Quote.Author: Vinnie Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to be the romantic lead one day, but I've got to grow my hair first

Quote.Author: Vinnie Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I was captain of Wales; I've been captain of numerous football clubs

Quote.Author: Vinnie Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, England is past its sell-by date. It's not the country I grew up in

Quote.Author: Vinnie Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Awareness about heart disease has got to be raised

Quote.Author: Vinny Guadagnino
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody wants to be a lawyer - it's hard work. But it was kind of my academic route

Quote.Author: Vinny Guadagnino
Quote.QuoteValue: Partying isn't every aspect to my personality

Quote.Author: Vinny Guadagnino
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother's my biggest supporter

Quote.Author: Vinny Guadagnino
Quote.QuoteValue: I am fascinated by quantum physics

Quote.Author: Vinny Guadagnino
Quote.QuoteValue: I take improv classes. Improv is something I can use in any aspect of life

Quote.Author: Vinny Guadagnino
Quote.QuoteValue: It helps me when I help people

Quote.Author: Vinny Guadagnino
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom's gonna be the biggest star - mark my words right now!

Quote.Author: Vinny Guadagnino
Quote.QuoteValue: You never really see me acting a fool on TV

Quote.Author: Vinny Guadagnino
Quote.QuoteValue: I graduated from CUNY College of Staten Island with a 3.9 GPA in three and a half years

Quote.Author: Vinny Guadagnino
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy painting and can copy almost anything

Quote.Author: Vint Cerf
Quote.QuoteValue: Although I've had several major career changes, I was extremely hesitant about making some of them

Quote.Author: Vint Cerf
Quote.QuoteValue: Instant messaging and chat rooms have basically created a level playing field for deaf people

Quote.Author: Vint Cerf
Quote.QuoteValue: The computer would do anything you programmed it to do

Quote.Author: Vint Cerf
Quote.QuoteValue: Yet we still see continuous reports of bugs

Quote.Author: Vint Cerf
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in a very complex world

Quote.Author: Vint Cerf
Quote.QuoteValue: The Internet lives where anyone can access it

Quote.Author: Vint Cerf
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to be young to learn about technology. You have to feel young

Quote.Author: Vint Cerf
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea that you can somehow erase the Internet is silly

Quote.Author: Vint Cerf
Quote.QuoteValue: Sleep is a waste of time

Quote.Author: Vint Cerf
Quote.QuoteValue: Privacy may actually be an anomaly

Quote.Author: Virat Kohli
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success

Quote.Author: Virat Kohli
Quote.QuoteValue: No cricket team in the world depends on one or two players. The team always plays to win

Quote.Author: Virat Kohli
Quote.QuoteValue: I delayed my father's funeral because of cricket

Quote.Author: Virat Kohli
Quote.QuoteValue: Delhi means everything to me. This city has given me everything, and I love it

Quote.Author: Virat Kohli
Quote.QuoteValue: I love driving my car on any highway

Quote.Author: Virat Kohli
Quote.QuoteValue: The more centuries that I am able to score, the happier I will be

Quote.Author: Virat Kohli
Quote.QuoteValue: I support Real Madrid. I'm a big fan of Cristiano Ronaldo

Quote.Author: Virat Kohli
Quote.QuoteValue: Becoming an inspiration for kids is great. I want to inspire them to do whatever they want to

Quote.Author: Virat Kohli
Quote.QuoteValue: Good Punjabi music before a match pumps me up. It gives me a kick

Quote.Author: Virat Kohli
Quote.QuoteValue: People from North India are generally known to be aggressive and emotional

Quote.Author: Virgil Goode
Quote.QuoteValue: All of us who serve in the House of Representatives and the Senate pay into Social Security

Quote.Author: Virgil Goode
Quote.QuoteValue: It's time we had a president who stood up for American workers first

Quote.Author: Virgil Goode
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't need to bring 100,000 refugees in from the Middle East

Quote.Author: Virgil Goode
Quote.QuoteValue: You've just got to be honest and straightforward

Quote.Author: Virgil Goode
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is measured differently by different people

Quote.Author: Virgil Goode
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm for a balanced budget now

Quote.Author: Virgil Goode
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a huge cost that comes with illegal immigration

Quote.Author: Virgil Goode
Quote.QuoteValue: The Founding Fathers had just four Cabinet departments and the postmaster general

Quote.Author: Virgil Goode
Quote.QuoteValue: The salary of a member of Congress ends the day that he of she leaves office

Quote.Author: Virgil Goode
Quote.QuoteValue: The progress in Iraq has not been without cost

Quote.Author: Virginia Postrel
Quote.QuoteValue: Storage problems make neon signs the most ephemeral of commercial arts

Quote.Author: Virginia Postrel
Quote.QuoteValue: The impulse for personal adornment is hard to stamp out

Quote.Author: Virginia Postrel
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is about exploring the unknown and cannot offer guarantees

Quote.Author: Virginia Postrel
Quote.QuoteValue: Wars without military objectives have a tendency to go on forever

Quote.Author: Virginia Postrel
Quote.QuoteValue: When credit is cheaper to use and easier to arrange, people do use more of it

Quote.Author: Virginia Postrel
Quote.QuoteValue: Dialysis does not make patients well. It simply postpones their deaths

Quote.Author: Virginia Postrel
Quote.QuoteValue: The mobile middle class gravitates to the cities where housing is affordable

Quote.Author: Virginia Postrel
Quote.QuoteValue: Clothes are unique sculptures, dependent on a supporting human form and created to move

Quote.Author: Virginia Postrel
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole point of movie glamour was - and is - escape

Quote.Author: Virginia Postrel
Quote.QuoteValue: On the Internet, people on the tails of the bell curve can find one another

Quote.Author: Vittorio Alfieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Deep vengeance is the daughter of deep silence

Quote.Author: Vittorio Alfieri
Quote.QuoteValue: A usurper always distrusts the whole world

Quote.Author: Vittorio Alfieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Disgrace does not consist in the punishment, but in the crime

Quote.Author: Vittorio Alfieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Liars are always most disposed to swear

Quote.Author: Vittorio Alfieri
Quote.QuoteValue: To err is human; but contrition felt for the crime distinguishes the virtuous from the wicked

Quote.Author: Vittorio Alfieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Where there are laws, he who has not broken them need not tremble

Quote.Author: Vittorio Alfieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Often the test of courage is not to die but to live

Quote.Author: Vittorio Alfieri
Quote.QuoteValue: First thoughts are not always the best

Quote.Author: Vittorio Alfieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Heaven takes care that no man secures happiness by crime

Quote.Author: Vittorio Alfieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Ofttimes the test of courage becomes rather to live than to die

Quote.Author: Vivien Leigh
Quote.QuoteValue: Dear Lord, I'm so grateful I'm still loved

Quote.Author: Vivien Leigh
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not afraid to die

Quote.Author: Vivien Leigh
Quote.QuoteValue: I know I am right for Scarlett. I can convince Mr. Selznick

Quote.Author: Vivien Leigh
Quote.QuoteValue: Every single night I'm nervous. You never know how the audience is going to react

Quote.Author: Vivien Leigh
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I dread the truth of the lines I say. But the dread must never show

Quote.Author: Vivien Leigh
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Scorpio, and Scorpios eat themselves out and burn themselves up like me

Quote.Author: Vivien Leigh
Quote.QuoteValue: A lucky thing Eva Peron was. She died at 32. I'm already 45

Quote.Author: Vivien Leigh
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been mad about cats

Quote.Author: Vivien Leigh
Quote.QuoteValue: I need something truly beautiful to look at in hotel rooms

Quote.Author: Vivien Leigh
Quote.QuoteValue: I adore dancing

Quote.Author: Vivienne Ming
Quote.QuoteValue: What drives success, and the most successful students, is internal motivation

Quote.Author: Vivienne Ming
Quote.QuoteValue: AI might be a powerful technology, but things won't get better simply by adding AI

Quote.Author: Vivienne Ming
Quote.QuoteValue: Discrimination is not done by villains. It's done by us

Quote.Author: Vivienne Ming
Quote.QuoteValue: The traditional markers people use for hiring can be wrong - profoundly wrong

Quote.Author: Vivienne Ming
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not enthusiastic about educational games or apps generally

Quote.Author: Vivienne Ming
Quote.QuoteValue: We are bad at valuing other people, and we are worse the more different they are than us

Quote.Author: Vivienne Ming
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to literally make people smarter by jamming things in their brains

Quote.Author: Vivienne Ming
Quote.QuoteValue: The bias tax is actually a loss in economy

Quote.Author: Vivienne Ming
Quote.QuoteValue: The tax on being different is massive

Quote.Author: Vivienne Ming
Quote.QuoteValue: Who wants to get a worse diagnosis of their cancer, just to keep a human doctor in the job?

Quote.Author: Vivienne Westwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't think without my glasses

Quote.Author: Vivienne Westwood
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nowhere else like London. Nothing at all, anywhere

Quote.Author: Vivienne Westwood
Quote.QuoteValue: If you hear Anarchy in the UK today your hair stands on end. It gives you the shivers

Quote.Author: Vivienne Westwood
Quote.QuoteValue: People have never looked so ugly as they do today. We just consume far too much

Quote.Author: Vivienne Westwood
Quote.QuoteValue: There is so much that people take for granted

Quote.Author: Vivienne Westwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Print some money and give it to us for the rain forests

Quote.Author: Vivienne Westwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion has become so whatever. I don't think there are any stones left to unturn

Quote.Author: Vivienne Westwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I love designing at the moment, I'm so happy with my work

Quote.Author: Vivienne Westwood
Quote.QuoteValue: What I'm always trying to say to the consumer is: buy less, choose well, make it last

Quote.Author: Vivienne Westwood
Quote.QuoteValue: My son has followed fashion since he was a punk. He and I agree that fashion is about sex

Quote.Author: Vladimir Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: My future is in my past and my past is my present. I must now make the present my future

Quote.Author: Vladimir Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: My face is my passport

Quote.Author: Vladimir Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfection itself is imperfection

Quote.Author: Vladimir Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a general. My soldiers are the keys and I have to command them

Quote.Author: Vladimir Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want me to play only the notes without any specific dynamics, I will never make one mistake

Quote.Author: Vladimir Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a terrible student. For me, to take a book home was a trial

Quote.Author: Vladimir Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Imitation is a caricature. Any imitation. Find out for yourself

Quote.Author: Vladimir Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Without false modesty, I feel that, when I'm on the stage, I'm the king, the boss of the situation

Quote.Author: Vladimir Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved singing. But can you imagine my voice in an opera house?

Quote.Author: Vladimir Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: The score is not a bible, and I am never afraid to dare. The music is behind those dots

Quote.Author: Vladimir Zhirinovsky
Quote.QuoteValue: A mother-in-law is better than a single and childless political persona, though

Quote.Author: Vladimir Zhirinovsky
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, in general, the danger is from Oriental faiths and Islam

Quote.Author: Vladimir Zhirinovsky
Quote.QuoteValue: If Russia rises, it means that the USA falls down

Quote.Author: Vladimir Zhirinovsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Military police is very timely for our army

Quote.Author: Vladimir Zhirinovsky
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing I oppose is persecuting of Eastern Orthodox priests and temples

Quote.Author: Vladimir Zhirinovsky
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no problem with the opening of new houses of prayer for Lutherans and Pentecostals

Quote.Author: Vladimir Zhirinovsky
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in full freedom for Christians of all denominations

Quote.Author: Vladimir Zhirinovsky
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm against the capturing of Eastern Orthodox temples

Quote.Author: Vladimir Zhirinovsky
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never signed any contract and never received a cent from Iraq

Quote.Author: Vladimir Zhirinovsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Let Catholics build their own churches and works

Quote.Author: Vonda Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a hard-core cult following of at least 12

Quote.Author: Vonda Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't really stop doing the music because it really feeds me

Quote.Author: Vonda Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: At first, I wanted to start my own label, but it was such a full-time job that it became too much

Quote.Author: Vonda Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: Success was overnight, but it was a very long night

Quote.Author: Vonda Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: I seem to be drawn to the really romantic songs

Quote.Author: Vonda Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: I have played lots of clubs since I was 14, but I always did my own music

Quote.Author: Vonda Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have much time for TV shows, but if I did, I'd watch 'Seinfeld' reruns

Quote.Author: Vonda Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: The last thing I wanted was a big paycheck but no inspiration or support

Quote.Author: Vonda Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: My nature is to worry about everything too much

Quote.Author: Vonda Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not just a chick singer who sings high all the time

Quote.Author: W. Clement Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star

Quote.Author: W. Clement Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Prayer is man's greatest power!

Quote.Author: W. Clement Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Sales are contingent upon the attitude of the salesman - not the attitude of the prospect

Quote.Author: W. Clement Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: What contemptible scoundrel has stolen the cork to my lunch?

Quote.Author: W. Clement Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: To be happy, make other people happy

Quote.Author: W. Clement Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Try, try, try, and keep on trying is the rule that must be followed to become an expert in anything

Quote.Author: W. Clement Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Big doors swing on little hinges

Quote.Author: W. Clement Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will

Quote.Author: W. Clement Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: When we direct our thoughts properly, we can control our emotions

Quote.Author: W. Clement Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying

Quote.Author: W. H. Auden
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all here on earth to help others; what on earth the others are here for I don't know

Quote.Author: W. H. Auden
Quote.QuoteValue: A poet is, before anything else, a person who is passionately in love with language

Quote.Author: W. H. Auden
Quote.QuoteValue: Death is the sound of distant thunder at a picnic

Quote.Author: W. H. Auden
Quote.QuoteValue: All sins tend to be addictive, and the terminal point of addiction is damnation

Quote.Author: W. H. Auden
Quote.QuoteValue: A professor is someone who talks in someone else's sleep

Quote.Author: W. H. Auden
Quote.QuoteValue: God bless the USA, so large, so friendly, and so rich

Quote.Author: W. H. Auden
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Healing,' Papa would tell me, 'is not a science, but the intuitive art of wooing nature.'

Quote.Author: W. H. Auden
Quote.QuoteValue: If time were the wicked sheriff in a horse opera, I'd pay for riding lessons and take his gun away

Quote.Author: W. H. Auden
Quote.QuoteValue: Learn from your dreams what you lack

Quote.Author: W. H. Auden
Quote.QuoteValue: In times of joy, all of us wished we possessed a tail we could wag

Quote.Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote.QuoteValue: Every production of an artist should be the expression of an adventure of his soul

Quote.Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote.QuoteValue: The love that lasts longest is the love that is never returned

Quote.Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is only a dirty trick played on us to achieve continuation of the species

Quote.Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote.QuoteValue: The ability to quote is a serviceable substitute for wit

Quote.Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote.QuoteValue: Tolerance is another word for indifference

Quote.Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote.QuoteValue: There are three rules for writing a novel. Unfortunately, no one knows what they are

Quote.Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't change your beliefs, your life will be like this forever. Is that good news?

Quote.Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote.QuoteValue: Impropriety is the soul of wit

Quote.Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote.QuoteValue: The great American novel has not only already been written, it has already been rejected

Quote.Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote.QuoteValue: There are two good things in life - freedom of thought and freedom of action

Quote.Author: Wale
Quote.QuoteValue: My job is to inspire the people, to be on top of my game and push my culture forward

Quote.Author: Wale
Quote.QuoteValue: No days off. I'm a workaholic

Quote.Author: Wale
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't wanna sound pretentious talking about myself

Quote.Author: Wale
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a Nike person

Quote.Author: Wale
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love a super human memory. My memory has never been good

Quote.Author: Wale
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a black man in the United States of America, so I always feel like there's a target on me

Quote.Author: Wale
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is better than a lot of people I know. I'm definitely happy about that

Quote.Author: Wale
Quote.QuoteValue: Making love is, simply put, poetry in motion

Quote.Author: Wale
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a passionate person, to a fault at times

Quote.Author: Wale
Quote.QuoteValue: I speak my mind. That's what we loved Tupac for

Quote.Author: Wallace Shawn
Quote.QuoteValue: I spend most of my time thinking about things like laundry and buying stationery supplies

Quote.Author: Wallace Shawn
Quote.QuoteValue: I have more free time than a lot of individuals, so, instead of talking, I sometimes write

Quote.Author: Wallace Shawn
Quote.QuoteValue: Even with my wife, I find sharing soup is hard

Quote.Author: Wallace Shawn
Quote.QuoteValue: 'The Princess Bride' is by far the most popular film I've ever done. I don't think I'll ever top it

Quote.Author: Wallace Shawn
Quote.QuoteValue: I never planned to be an actor. It turned out I could make a living doing it

Quote.Author: Wallace Shawn
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an enormous appetite to see life as I know it presented in front of my eyes

Quote.Author: Wallace Shawn
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been vain since birth

Quote.Author: Wallace Shawn
Quote.QuoteValue: My plays have been strange from the beginning, and they never got unstrange

Quote.Author: Wallace Shawn
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see that many plays, and for me, musicals are rarely pleasing

Quote.Author: Wallace Shawn
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have a television, and I'm just not too up on television

Quote.Author: Wallace Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: The most beautiful thing in the world is, of course, the world itself

Quote.Author: Wallace Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: Perhaps the truth depends on a walk around the lake

Quote.Author: Wallace Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: A poet looks at the world the way a man looks at a woman

Quote.Author: Wallace Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: Money is a kind of poetry

Quote.Author: Wallace Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: In the world of words, the imagination is one of the forces of nature

Quote.Author: Wallace Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: The way through the world is more difficult to find than the way beyond it

Quote.Author: Wallace Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: The philosopher proves that the philosopher exists. The poet merely enjoys existence

Quote.Author: Wallace Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: The fire burns as the novel taught it how

Quote.Author: Wallace Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: Our bloom is gone. We are the fruit thereof

Quote.Author: Wallace Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: Accuracy of observation is the equivalent of accuracy of thinking

Quote.Author: Walt Mossberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I try not to make snap judgments. I never, ever make conclusions about products I've never tried

Quote.Author: Walt Mossberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent 19 years as a Washington reporter covering a variety of beats

Quote.Author: Walt Mossberg
Quote.QuoteValue: My first computers were a Timex Sinclair and an Apple II

Quote.Author: Walt Mossberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Apple is all-in on Apple hardware and still wants you to be all-in, too

Quote.Author: Walt Mossberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Has the smartphone begun to mature, plateau out?

Quote.Author: Walt Mossberg
Quote.QuoteValue: What could a smartphone do for me that would make people go out and buy another one?

Quote.Author: Walt Mossberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The car is the ultimate mobile device, isn't it?

Quote.Author: Walt Mossberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I use my iPad many times a day, and it has cut my use of my laptop by more than half

Quote.Author: Walt Mossberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Back in May of 2008, the Kindle was still quite new, and we focused on that

Quote.Author: Walt Mossberg
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a blizzard of metrics that social sites and messaging sites put out there

Quote.Author: Walter Annenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Never buy four C-plus paintings when you can buy one A

Quote.Author: Walter Annenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: When we hold back out of laziness, that is when we tie ourselves into knots of boredom

Quote.Author: Walter Annenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: In the world today, a young lady who does not have a college education just is not educated

Quote.Author: Walter Annenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: My country has been very good to me; I must be good to my country

Quote.Author: Walter Annenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: All I ever seek from good deeds is a measure of respect

Quote.Author: Walter Annenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: People who think about art as an investment are pathetic

Quote.Author: Walter Annenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I have very little respect for Nancy Reagan. There is something about her that is very petty

Quote.Author: Walter Annenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest power is not money power, but political power

Quote.Author: Walter Annenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Too much work, too much vacation, too much of any one thing is unsound
